content.text: ###MangoNote is an flexible notebook with d3 visualizations

Double-click this text to edit. Use **Markdown** to format your text!

* Click "Add Content" then "text" to add another text box

* Click "Add Content" then "Image" to add an image!

* After Editing text, press **Shift+Enter** to save and exit edit mode!

```ruby
require 'redcarpet'
markdown = Redcarpet.new("Hello World!")
puts markdown.to_html
```

### Click "Add Section" on the left to create a new section!

* You can change the section title by clicking it


* You can change the section order by clicking and dragging on the left

####Here is an image I uploaded from my computer:

We need to test each feature of mangonote each time we add a feature! Here are a list of the mangonote features to address:

* Switch order of the sections by clicking and dragging
* Change section name by clicking on title at the top of the page
* Delete and add a section
* Double click text to edit, shift+enter to save and exit edit mode
* Change the order of content within a section (arrows)
* Add an image with a link
* Add an image with an upload
* Change the size of an image
* Add a table
* Add an iframe
* Delete a content item (trash can)
